alert.note: Alert for Southwest Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 21 at 2:37PM MDT until October 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT MDT SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Winds will be the strongest Saturday morning across Cedar City to Black Rock Canyon and spread through the remainder of southwestern Utah through late morning into early afternoon. * WHERE...Southwest Utah. * WHEN...From 6 AM Saturday to midnight MDT Saturday night. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind including Halloween decorations.
